p.k: When Mum reveals that Gumball's real name is "Zach", Gumball adopts a cheesy, annoying persona to match the name. / The kids finally get the puppy they always wanted, except itâ€™s a turtle. / The secret behind Anton's immortality. / Miss Simian has to save herself from a contagious Joy virus infecting the whole school. / The new coach at Elmore High stands up to Jamie. / Sarah, the new kid in school, is Gumball and Darwin's number one, slightly obsessive, fan. / Whilst Gumball and Darwin make fun of Mum and Dad for being old, their voices start to break. / The Wattersons are surprised to discover that their past actions have consequences. / The life of the background objects of Elmore are shown in a series of short skits.
